_header: An angel said to that maid so free
Subjects: Virgin Mary, Annunciation to; carols, Annunciation
_description: James Ryman (?), A carol of the Annunciation — eight quatrains (aaab) and three-line burden (ccb): ‘Mary so mylde so meke so fre / Hath borne a chylde of hyghe degre / And his name ys Ihesus’

CULEe112.First Lines:
An angelle seide to thatte meyde so ffreHayle fulle of grace god is
                    with the…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…And forthwithall as he behyghtSche conceyuyd
                    Ihesus
CULEe112.Note: Not attributed to Ryman in MS.

            1977: 182; 1977, 160-1.
